subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: It is far from inevitable that Jimmie Johnson will capture his first Nextel Cup points championship on Sunday, but perhaps it is appropriate after all this time that Johnson finish what has been building for years.
snippet: It is far from inevitable that Jimmie Johnson will capture his first Nextel Cup points championship on Sunday, but perhaps it is appropriate after all this time that Johnson finish what has been building for years.
